message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. I would like to propose a price of $95 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell it to you for $105.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $100 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I'm getting closer to your price, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to sell it to you for $102.
I understand your position, Alice. I am willing to pay $101 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I'm almost there. I'm willing to sell it to you for $103.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. I am willing to pay $102 for the product.
